Container.Name: ActualServer
Container.Overview:
Actual is a super fast privacy-focused app for managing your finances. You own your data and it will sync it across all devices with optional end-to-end encryption..
The Software was created by The Actual Team.
Client GitHub repo: https://github.com/actualbudget/actual | Server GitHub repo: https://github.com/actualbudget/actual-server
